verses.verse: And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass in the <S%H6240>eleventh<s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> in the <S%H259>first<s%> day of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> that the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to me, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H3282>because<s%> that <S%H6865>Tyrus<s%> has <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%H253>Aha,<s%> she is <S%H7665>broken<s%> that was the <S%H1817>gates<s%> of the <S%H5971>people:<s%> she is <S%H5437>turned<s%> to me: I shall be <S%H4390>replenished,<s%> now she is laid <S%H2717>waste:<s%>

<S%H3651>Therefore<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> I am <S%H5921>against<s%> you, O <S%H6865>Tyrus,<s%> and will cause <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> to <S%H5927>come<s%> up <S%H5921>against<s%> you, as the <S%H3220>sea<s%> causes his <S%H1530>waves<s%> to <S%H5927>come<s%> up.

And they shall <S%H7843>destroy<s%> the <S%H2346>walls<s%> of <S%H6865>Tyrus,<s%> and <S%H2040>break<s%> <S%H2040>down<s%> her <S%H4026>towers:<s%> I will also <S%H5500>scrape<s%> her <S%H6083>dust<s%> from her, and <S%H5414>make<s%> her like the <S%H6706>top<s%> of a <S%H5553>rock.<s%>

It shall be a place for the <S%H4894>spreading<s%> of <S%H2764>nets<s%> in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea:<s%> for I have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> it, <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD:<s%> and it shall <S%H1961>become<s%> a <S%H957>spoil<s%> to the <S%H1471>nations.<s%>
And her <S%H1323>daughters<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> are in the <S%H7704>field<s%> shall be <S%H2026>slain<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword;<s%> and they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

For <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> I will <S%H935>bring<s%> on <S%H6865>Tyrus<s%> <S%H5019>Nebuchadrezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> a <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4428>kings,<s%> from the <S%H6828>north,<s%> with <S%H5483>horses,<s%> and with <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> and with <S%H6571>horsemen,<s%> and <S%H6951>companies,<s%> and <S%H7227>much<s%> <S%H5971>people.<s%>

He shall <S%H4191>slay<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword<s%> your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> in the <S%H7704>field:<s%> and he shall <S%H5414>make<s%> a <S%H1785>fort<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> you, and <S%H8210>cast<s%> a <S%H5550>mount<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> you, and <S%H6965>lift<s%> up the <S%H6793>buckler<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> you.

And he shall <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H4239>engines<s%> of <S%H6904>war<s%> against your <S%H2346>walls,<s%> and with his <S%H2719>axes<s%> he shall <S%H5422>break<s%> <S%H5422>down<s%> your <S%H4026>towers.<s%>

By reason of the <S%H8229>abundance<s%> of his <S%H5483>horses<s%> their <S%H80>dust<s%> shall <S%H3680>cover<s%> you: your <S%H2346>walls<s%> shall <S%H7493>shake<s%> at the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of the <S%H6571>horsemen,<s%> and of the <S%H1534>wheels,<s%> and of the <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> when he shall <S%H935>enter<s%> into your <S%H8179>gates,<s%> as men <S%H935>enter<s%> into a <S%H5892>city<s%> wherein is made a <S%H1234>breach.<s%>

With the <S%H6541>hoofs<s%> of his <S%H5483>horses<s%> shall he <S%H7429>tread<s%> down <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H2351>streets:<s%> he shall <S%H4191>slay<s%> your <S%H5971>people<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and your <S%H5797>strong<s%> <S%H4676>garrisons<s%> shall <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H776>ground.<s%>

And they shall <S%H5414>make<s%> a <S%H7997>spoil<s%> of your <S%H2428>riches,<s%> and make a <S%H962>prey<s%> of your <S%H7404>merchandise:<s%> and they shall <S%H2040>break<s%> <S%H2040>down<s%> your <S%H2346>walls,<s%> and <S%H5422>destroy<s%> your <S%H2532>pleasant<s%> <S%H1004>houses:<s%> and they shall <S%H7760>lay<s%> your <S%H68>stones<s%> and your <S%H6086>timber<s%> and your <S%H6083>dust<s%> in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H4325>water.<s%>

And I will cause the <S%H1995>noise<s%> of your <S%H7892>songs<s%> to <S%H7673>cease;<s%> and the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of your <S%H3658>harps<s%> shall be <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H8085>heard.<s%>

And I will make you like the <S%H6706>top<s%> of a <S%H5553>rock:<s%> you shall be a place to <S%H4894>spread<s%> <S%H2764>nets<s%> on; you shall be <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more:<s%> for I the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> it, <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD.<s%>

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%> to <S%H6865>Tyrus;<s%> Shall not the <S%H339>isles<s%> <S%H7493>shake<s%> at the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of your <S%H4658>fall,<s%> when the <S%H2491>wounded<s%> <S%H602>cry,<s%> when the <S%H2027>slaughter<s%> is made in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of you?

Then <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5387>princes<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> shall <S%H3381>come<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> from their <S%H3678>thrones,<s%> and <S%H5493>lay<s%> <S%H5493>away<s%> their <S%H4598>robes,<s%> and <S%H6584>put<s%> off their <S%H7553>broidered<s%> <S%H899>garments:<s%> they shall <S%H3847>clothe<s%> themselves with <S%H2731>trembling;<s%> they shall <S%H3427>sit<s%> on the <S%H776>ground,<s%> and shall <S%H2729>tremble<s%> at every <S%H7281>moment,<s%> and be <S%H8074>astonished<s%> at you.

And they shall <S%H5375>take<s%> up a <S%H7015>lamentation<s%> for you, and <S%H559>say<s%> to you, <S%H349>How<s%> are you <S%H6>destroyed,<s%> that were <S%H3427>inhabited<s%> of <S%H3220>seafaring<s%> men, the <S%H1984>renowned<s%> <S%H5892>city,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were <S%H2389>strong<s%> in the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> she and her <S%H3427>inhabitants,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H5414>cause<s%> their <S%H2851>terror<s%> to be on <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H3427>haunt<s%> it!

<S%H6258>Now<s%> shall the <S%H339>isles<s%> <S%H2729>tremble<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of your <S%H4658>fall;<s%> yes, the <S%H339>isles<s%> that are in the <S%H3220>sea<s%> shall be <S%H926>troubled<s%> at your <S%H3318>departure.<s%>

For <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> When I shall <S%H5414>make<s%> you a <S%H2717>desolate<s%> <S%H5892>city,<s%> like the <S%H5892>cities<s%> that are not <S%H3427>inhabited;<s%> when I shall <S%H5927>bring<s%> up the <S%H8415>deep<s%> on you, and <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%> shall <S%H3680>cover<s%> you;

When I shall <S%H3381>bring<s%> you <S%H3381>down<s%> with them that <S%H3381>descend<s%> into the <S%H953>pit,<s%> with the <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H5769>old<s%> time, and shall <S%H3427>set<s%> you in the <S%H8482>low<s%> parts of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> in places <S%H2723>desolate<s%> of <S%H5769>old,<s%> with them that <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H953>pit,<s%> that you be not <S%H3427>inhabited;<s%> and I shall <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H6643>glory<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H2416>living;<s%>

I will <S%H5414>make<s%> you a <S%H1091>terror,<s%> and you shall be <S%H369>no<s%> more: though you be <S%H1245>sought<s%> for, yet shall you <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H5769><s%> be <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H5750>again,<s%> <S%H5001>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD.<s%>
